metas.description: All the betting and form for the 2015 Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle at the Cheltenham Festival, it takes place on the final day of the Festival just before the Gold Cup.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 4 - Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle Odds

The Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle has been run at the Cheltenham Festival since 2005 but it is now a firm favourite with punters as we see the novice hurdlers race over 3 miles. It is a staying race so it can be an exciting race over the final mile and we have had some excellent winners recently, Weapons Amnesty won the race in 2009 before going onto win the RSA Chase last season so it can be an excellent starting point for staying hurdlers.

Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle - Click To Bet

14:40 Albert Bartlett Novices' Hurdle (Registered As The Spa Novices' Hurdle) (Grade 1)
1.Martello Tower - M Mullins - A Heskin - 14/1
2.Milsean - W Mullins - D Mullins - 33/1
3.No More Heroes - G Elliott - B Cooper - 6/1
20 Ran
